text: A soldier is given a military discharge when they can leave the military. There are two types of military discharges, dishonorable discharges, and honorable discharges. Soldiers are dishonorably discharged when they do very immoral things, like rape, murder, and war crimes. Soldiers are honorably discharged when they can't fight anymore, like if they get shot. == Related pages == * Layoff == References == Category:Military
title: Military discharge
